name: A Wizard's Wand
description:
A Wizard's Wand is his most powerful tool and his most trusted ally. A tool that's as versatile as it is powerful. Never leave home without it!!!

Controls The important things are: • Grab
• Wand - Shoot
• Wand - Cycle Left
• Wand - Cycle Right
• Teleport
• Interact with UI Index

At any time:
Press trackpad to teleport
Left or right on the stick for snap turn

While holding wand:
Trigger - Use spell
A or B - Cycle Spell

While not holding wand:
Pull trigger on right controller to call wand
Pull trigger on left controller to call torch
[If holding wand in left hand the summoning is reversed]

In order to press buttons you must have an empty hand

Oculus

At any time:
Press stick up, down, or click to teleport
Left or right on the stick for snap turn

While holding wand:
Trigger - Use spell
X or Y - Cycle Spell

While not holding wand:
Pull trigger on right controller to call wand
Pull trigger on left controller to call torch
[If holding wand in left hand the summoning is reversed]

Vive

At any time:
Press trackpad up, down, or center to teleport
Left or right on the trackpad for snap turn

While holding wand:
Trigger - Use spell
Trackpad left or right - Cycle Spell

While not holding wand:
Pull trigger on right controller to call wand
Pull trigger on left controller to call torch
[If holding wand in left hand the summoning is reversed]

Note: For the HTC Vive, you'll need to edit the bindings so that the default action map for your main hand (wand hand) doesn't have snap turn on the mapping so you can change spells without accidentally snap turning.
